text: Transcribing audio can be time-consuming,
complex and expensive,
requiring you to either hire someone to do it manually
or to use a costly service.
Amazon Transcribe solves this
by using deep learning technology
to automatically convert speech to text in real time,
and you don't even need
any machine learning experience to use it.
It's fully managed and continuously trained,
so it's state-of-the-art speech recognition models
are constantly improving.
It makes live transcription easier too,
with features like timestamps, punctuation,
speaker labeling, and automatic language identification.
You can start extracting key business insights
to better understand call sentiment and speech volume
to improve agent productivity
and customer experience.
Enhance the accuracy of your transcriptions
with custom models that understand
your domain-specific vocabulary by adding phrases
and words commonly used within your business and industry.
When instructed, Amazon Transcribe can help you identify
and redact sensitive, personally identifiable information
from supported language transcripts,
which ensures your customer's privacy.
Get the most out of your conversations today
with Amazon Transcribe.
